ygData.subject: LVL 12 Troll Shaman looking for guidance
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello out there. I managed to go from 1-9 in the swamp and grobb and now I m in EC. I had an ogre friend escort over the dunes of North Ro and Oasis to get to
ygData.messageBody:
Hello out there. I managed to go from 1-9 in the
swamp and grobb and now I'm in EC. I had an ogre friend
escort over the dunes of North Ro and Oasis to get to
the EC and the tunnel. We continued on through to the
Nek forest to get to the foreign quarter of Neriak. I
am bound there. FQ is good because I can hunt in EC
(camp the orc camps) or solo in nek forest and then
sell to DEs in FQ. I'm rapidly approaching a
crossroads. I've been reading around about how WC and it's
wisps can be lucrative but all the NPCs (hihglevel
spawns) seem very dangerous. Another option might be the
lavastorm mts. Two questions. Once I hit 14th level and I
need to get my spells (remember I am a shaman) I have
to go back to the swamp to get them? Should I try to
buy a teleport? I'm really looking forward to bind so
I can venture further. Another question is what
would be a better spot to lvl 12 up, WC or Lava MTs?
What I really need is a bud to teleport me back to
grobb to get my 14th level spells. Appreciate any
advice veteran players have. More questions: I am
frequently encumbered by my banded armor I heard someone
talk on another forum about a minthril tunic and gator
legs. Should I stick with all my banded and loot less
trash. I usually just gate to neriak to dump the trash
anyway. Despite the tunnel's proximity I'm a sitting duck
running through EC to get to it even with SOW
encumberred. I have been killed twice by sargent Slate ( a
good guy NPC-guard type by the inns in EC) now I stick
to the tops of hills when I cross from the orc camps
to the tunnel at NRO.<br><br>Plenty of questions
about armor, where to play and getting back to Grobb.
Getting through NRO and Oasis on my own is most likely a
no-go. I tried once and the desert madmen were very
aggressive.<br><br>let me know. Most of the posting have been for Good
characters but I assume there are a couple of experienced
players whho have played both sides of goodness vs evil
and can help me out.<br><br>Grumph, 12 lvl shaman
Vazaelle server
